body:
Hello Avicus community! Today I will be hosting a little poetry competiton!

The theme will be Halloween related. Come up with the best poem you can! Think of anything you wish. Be creative as you can! 

The deadline will be the Monday the 24th of October. The winning poem creator will receive an exclusive badge, for which they can choose!

You can submit a poem here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1N7NGdtof_78AzTuch95VY52TQxfriJ3weo55Fy5UqmE/edit

Good luck to everyone that participates! I look forward to seeing your poems! :)

title: Halloween Poetry Competition!

replies.body: Interesting. Is there a theme more specific than "Halloween", or can it be anything related to the event?
replies.body_tagged: Interesting. Is there a theme more specific than "Halloween", or can it be anything related to the event?

replies.body:
Base your poem off anything Halloween-related. For example, "Witches cackle in the night
Zombies and Skeletons out of sight"

You don't have to base it off Minecraft, any plans you have
like parties or
trick or treating you can add to.

Hope this was clear for you.
